verses.kjv: And the angel that talked with me came again, and waked me, as a man that is wakened out of his sleep,
verses.web: The angel who talked with me came again, and wakened me, as a man who is wakened out of his sleep.
verses.ct: The angel who had been speaking with me came back and woke me up, like someone being shaken out of a deep sleep.

verses.kjv: And said unto me, What seest thou? And I said, I have looked, and behold a candlestick all of gold, with a bowl upon the top of it, and his seven lamps thereon, and seven pipes to the seven lamps, which are upon the top thereof:
verses.web: He said to me, “What do you see?” I said, “I have seen, and behold, a lamp stand all of gold, with its bowl on the top of it, and its seven lamps on it; there are seven pipes to each of the lamps, which are on the top of it;
verses.ct: He asked me, "What do you see?" I answered, "I see a lampstand made entirely of gold. It has a bowl on top, with 7 lamps on it, and 7 channels feeding oil to each of the lamps.

verses.kjv: And two olive trees by it, one upon the right side of the bowl, and the other upon the left side thereof.
verses.web: and two olive trees by it, one on the right side of the bowl, and the other on the left side of it.”
verses.ct: There are also 2 olive trees beside it — one on the right side of the bowl and one on the left."

verses.kjv: So I answered and spake to the angel that talked with me, saying, What are these, my lord?
verses.web: I answered and spoke to the angel who talked with me, saying, “What are these, my lord?”
verses.ct: I turned to the angel who had been speaking with me and asked, "What are these, my lord?"

verses.kjv: Then the angel that talked with me answered and said unto me, Knowest thou not what these be? And I said, No, my lord.
verses.web: Then the angel who talked with me answered me, “Don’t you know what these are?” I said, “No, my lord.”
verses.ct: The angel replied, "You don't know what these are?" I said, "No, my lord."

verses.kjv: Then he answered and spake unto me, saying, This is the word of the LORD unto Zerubbabel, saying, Not by might, nor by power, but by my spirit, saith the LORD of hosts.
verses.web: Then he answered and spoke to me, saying, “This is LORD’s word to Zerubbabel, saying, ‘Not by might, nor by power, but by my Spirit,’ says LORD of Armies.
verses.ct: Then he told me, "This is the LORD's message to Zerubbabel: 'Not by might, nor by power, but by my Spirit,' says the LORD of hosts.

verses.kjv: Who art thou, O great mountain? before Zerubbabel thou shalt become a plain: and he shall bring forth the headstone thereof with shoutings, crying, Grace, grace unto it.
verses.web: Who are you, great mountain? Before Zerubbabel you are a plain; and he will bring out the capstone with shouts of ‘Grace, grace, to it!’ ”
verses.ct: "What are you, great mountain? Before Zerubbabel you will be leveled flat! He will set the final capstone in place while the people shout, 'Grace, grace to it!'"

verses.kjv: Moreover the word of the LORD came unto me, saying,
verses.web: Moreover LORD’s word came to me, saying,
verses.ct: Then the word of the LORD came to me:

verses.kjv: The hands of Zerubbabel have laid the foundation of this house; his hands shall also finish it; and thou shalt know that the LORD of hosts hath sent me unto you.
verses.web: “The hands of Zerubbabel have laid the foundation of this house. His hands shall also finish it; and you will know that LORD of Armies has sent me to you.
verses.ct: "Zerubbabel's own hands laid the foundation of this temple, and his own hands will finish it. When that happens, you will know that the LORD of hosts sent me to you.

verses.kjv: For who hath despised the day of small things? for they shall rejoice, and shall see the plummet in the hand of Zerubbabel with those seven; they are the eyes of the LORD, which run to and fro through the whole earth.
verses.web: Indeed, who despises the day of small things? For these seven shall rejoice, and shall see the plumb line in the hand of Zerubbabel. These are LORD’s eyes, which run back and forth through the whole earth.”
verses.ct: Who dares look down on a day of small beginnings? People will celebrate when they see the plumb line in Zerubbabel's hand. As for those 7 lamps — they are the eyes of the LORD, scanning back and forth across the entire earth."

verses.kjv: Then answered I, and said unto him, What are these two olive trees upon the right side of the candlestick and upon the left side thereof?
verses.web: Then I asked him, “What are these two olive trees on the right side of the lamp stand and on the left side of it?”
verses.ct: Then I asked the angel, "What are the 2 olive trees standing on the right and left sides of the lampstand?"

verses.kjv: And I answered again, and said unto him, What be these two olive branches which through the two golden pipes empty the golden oil out of themselves?
verses.web: I asked him the second time, “What are these two olive branches, which are beside the two golden spouts, that pour the golden oil out of themselves?”
verses.ct: I pressed further, "And what are the 2 olive branches beside the golden spouts that pour out golden oil?"

verses.kjv: And he answered me and said, Knowest thou not what these be? And I said, No, my lord.
verses.web: He answered me, “Don’t you know what these are?” I said, “No, my lord.”
verses.ct: He answered, "You really don't know what these are?" I said, "No, my lord."

verses.kjv: Then said he, These are the two anointed ones, that stand by the LORD of the whole earth.
verses.web: Then he said, “These are the two anointed ones who stand by the Lord of the whole earth.”
verses.ct: He said, "These are the 2 anointed ones who stand in the presence of the Lord of the whole earth."
